import React from 'react';

const meta: Meta<typeof Card> = {
  title: 'Generated/Feature Card',
  component: Card,
  parameters: { layout: 'centered' },
  tags: ['autodocs'],
};

export default meta;
type Story = StoryObj<typeof meta>;

};
